perks.name: Armsman
perks.description: 1: One-handed weapons do 20% more damage. 2: One-handed weapons do 40% more damage. 3: One-handed weapons do 60% more damage. 4: One-handed weapons do 80% more damage. 5: One-handed weapons do 100% more damage.

perks.name: Fighting Stance
perks.description: Power attacks with one-handed weapons cost 25% less stamina.

perks.name: Dual Savagery
perks.description: Dual wielding power attacks do 50% bonus damage.

perks.name: Overdraw
perks.description: 1: Bows do 20% more damage. 2: Bows do 40% more damage. 3: Bows do 60% more damage. 4: Bows do 80% more damage. 5: Bows do 100% more damage.

perks.name: Critical Shot
perks.description: 1: 10% chance of a critical hit that does extra damage. 2: 15% chance of a critical hit that does 25% more critical damage. 3: 20% chance of a critical hit that does 50% more critical damage.

perks.name: Ranger
perks.description: Able to move faster with a drawn bow.

perks.name: Eagle Eye
perks.description: Pressing block while aiming will zoom in your view.

perks.name: Steel Smithing
perks.description: Can create steel armor and weapons at forges, and improve them twice as much.

perks.name: Arcane Blacksmith
perks.description: You can improve magical weapons and armor.

perks.name: Dwarven Smithing
perks.description: Can create Dwarven armor and weapons at forges, and improve them twice as much.

perks.name: Elven Smithing
perks.description: Can create Elven armor and weapons at forges, and improve them twice as much.
